name: Covert Data Collection and Analysis
description: Techniques for gathering, analyzing, and verifying intelligence data while remaining undetected.

cards.title: OSINT Techniques for Uncovering Hidden Information
cards.description: Using open-source intelligence (OSINT) to track down concealed narratives and suppressed facts.
bulletpoints: Leveraging public databases, leaked documents, and investigative tools.
Utilizing metadata analysis to verify the origins of information.
Tracking down deleted and censored content through archival methods.

cards.title: Covert Intelligence Gathering and Secure Communication
cards.description: Maintaining operational security while collecting sensitive intelligence.
bulletpoints: Using encrypted communication methods to prevent detection.
Avoiding digital footprints that could lead to exposure.
Analyzing behavioral patterns of surveillance networks.

cards.title: Tracking and Verifying Disinformation Sources
cards.description: Tracing the origins of disinformation campaigns and exposing their funding sources.
bulletpoints: Mapping out coordinated bot networks used to spread propaganda.
Identifying financial and institutional backers of controlled narratives.
Using forensic linguistic analysis to detect fabricated content.
